en.title: Ahmed AbdElbar Portfolio - Software Test Engineer
en.hero_subtitle: I believe product quality isnâ€™t luckâ€”itâ€™s the result of precise, structured testing.
en.about_text: Junior Software Tester passionate about identifying issues before they impact users, with hands-on experience in Functional, API, and Regression Testing using tools like Postman, JIRA, and SQL. Proficient in SDLC, STLC, and Agile methodologies, capable of creating test cases, test plans, and analyzing results to uncover defects accurately. Always aiming to deliver stable, reliable software, minimizing risks before release while enhancing user experience and overall system quality.
en.specialty_1: âœ… Functional Testing: Conducting thorough testing of features to ensure every function works as expected on web and mobile applications.
en.specialty_2: âœ… API Testing: Verifying API functionality, data integrity, and system integration.
en.specialty_3: âœ… Bug Tracking & Reporting: Skilled in using JIRA and TestRail to accurately log, track, and manage defects.
en.specialty_4: âœ… Cross-Platform QA: Testing applications across multiple browsers and mobile devices to ensure seamless user experience.
en.specialty_5: âœ… Usability Testing: Evaluating user experience and ease of interaction with applications.
en.specialty_6: âœ… Continuous Learning & Adaptability: Quickly learning new tools and adapting to evolving project requirements.
en.skill_manual_desc: Functional Testing,Regression Testing,Exploratory Testing,API Testing (Postman),Automation Testing (Selenium )
en.skill_automation_desc: Java / Python basics,SQL queries for database testing,HTML, CSS, JavaScript (for UI testing support).
en.skill_tools_desc: Jira, Trello (Issue tracking),Git & GitHub (Version control),Browser Developer Tools,TestRail / Zephyr (Test management).
en.projects_subtitle: These are examples of projects where I applied various testing strategies and automated processes to ensure the highest level of quality.
en.certs_subtitle: The most important professional certifications I have obtained in the field of Quality Assurance, confirming my in-depth knowledge of the industry.
en.contact_text: Excited to discuss job opportunities, advanced QA strategies, or just connect professionally.
en.footer_text: | Ahmed AbdElbar Portfolio - Quality Assurance with Precision.
